scripts.push: git add . && git commit -m pre-release && git push && git pull
scripts.release: cd packages/code && yarn build && cd ../../ && yarn push && lerna publish patch --yes && yarn push
scripts.copy: rm -rf docs && mkdir -p docs/code && cp -a packages/zed-vision-site/public/. docs/ && cp -a packages/code/. docs/code/ && rm -rf docs/code/.certs
scripts.docker:push: yarn docker:build && yarn lerna run docker:push --parallel
